title: Hope
body: Hope that Store fix is gonna fix the FPS problem.

replies.body:
It's amazing 
the fps drops disapeared right after that SHOP bug fix announcement

or was that just me?
Heeeeey that's kinda weird xD. Whatever works I guess! I'm glad your fps seems to be back to normal after we fixed the shop. Feel free to hit me back up if those frames dip back down again ^_^!
